title: Relative Grading in MPCA & CN
content: Did we have relative grading in MPCA and CN for Computer Science Students?

comments.body:
What about DAA?
I'm cooked in internals and i didn't get hacker rank certificate.
We had negligible grace marks (which was what is generally called relative grading here) given to us in CN, DAA. Highly relative in MPCA tho. OS and LAA, there was 0 relative grading.

Depends on how your batch performs in your current semester. Historical data does not play a role in deciding whether a course is graded relatively. However, trends usually show that students tend to perform poorly in the same courses across all generations.

Last year for 2026 Batch there was no relative grading for MPCA absolutely not. CN paper was straightforward for us. Not much of relative grading by a grade ! It will be by 5-7 marks maximum not a grade increase 

I guess 90+/120 in both CN and MPCA will be range for A grade
